questions.question: Jesse Pollak stated his recent focus on prediction markets was not on making or betting, but on what specific activity?
questions.explanation: On December 17, Jesse Pollak cast: 'everyone wants to make or bet on prediction markets. i want to resolve them.'

questions.question: What milestone did Dan Romero congratulate the @baseapp.base.eth team for achieving on December 17?
options: Completing the migration to OP Stack
questions.explanation: Dan Romero cast: 'Congrats to the @baseapp.base.eth team for getting to GA!'

questions.question: How did Jesse Pollak characterize his involvement with Clanker tokens in December, noting he held 4 out of 12 top tokens?
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak cast: 'I didn’t consider myself one but on this mini app I'm a TRADER! I have 4/12 top Clanker tokens.'

questions.question: What was the mantra Brian Armstrong posted regarding the Base App on December 18?
options: BASE APP is now open source
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong posted simply: 'BASE APP IS FOR EVERYONE'.

questions.question: According to the Anthropic report shared by Jesse Pollak, what percentage of blockchain exploits carried out in 2025 could have been executed autonomously by current AI agents?
questions.explanation: The excerpt states: 'More than half of the blockchain exploits carried out in 2025... could have been executed autonomously by current AI agents,' specifically citing a jump to '55.88%.'

questions.question: What specific action did Dan Romero announce regarding Content Coins on December 15?
options: They will start displaying content coins from Base app casts on the Farcaster app.
They are deprecating content coins entirely.
Content coins will now be automatically converted to ETH.
They are introducing new coins specific to Base App.
questions.explanation: Dan Romero stated: 'We're going to start displaying content coins from Base app casts on the Farcaster app.'

questions.question: What was Jesse Pollak's stated top priority #1 in his November 26 list of top priorities?
options: Neynar AI: add agent capabilities, build in-feed agents on neynar
App studio: vibe code mini apps
questions.explanation: The list begins: '1. Developer infra: Farcaster + onchain data'.

questions.question: What was Jesse Pollak's stated top priority #3 in his November 26 list of top priorities?
options: App studio: vibe code mini apps
questions.explanation: The third priority listed was: '3. App studio: vibe code mini apps'.

questions.question: What recent action did the Clanker ecosystem take regarding accumulated native token fees, as reported by Dan Romero on December 16?
options: Redirected them entirely to the Foundation
Used them to purchase ETH liquidity
questions.explanation: The reported action was: '1. Burned accumulated native token fees'.

questions.question: Jesse Pollak described a transition on December 4 stating: 'We read a chain now, we write to a chain next.' What does this implicitly suggest about the near-term development focus?
options: Shifting focus from data consumption to active, on-chain transaction generation.
Migrating to a new chain architecture.
Implementing better read optimization via client hubs.
Focusing exclusively on off-chain storage solutions.
questions.explanation: Reading the chain implies data consumption; writing implies generating transactions or state changes (active interaction/composition).

questions.question: What primary reason did Dan Romero cite for pausing future Clanker presales?
options: The mechanism rewards speed to buy, not long-term alignment.
The smart contracts were found to be vulnerable.
Gas fees made presales uneconomical for users.
questions.explanation: Dan Romero's explanation noted: '1. The mechanism rewards speed to buy, not long-term alignment.'

questions.question: What specific technical issue did Brian Armstrong report experiencing with the Antigravity IDE?
options: It starts lagging so hard with 3+ agents running in parallel.
It randomly crashes when connecting to the node.
It failed to integrate with the new Protardio SDK.
The UI/UX was confusing for new users.
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong reported: 'is it just me or is antigravity IDE almost impossible to use with 3+ agents running in parallel? it starts lagging so hard'

questions.question: According to Dan Romero on December 18, what milestone did Base reach regarding its client usage on the Farcaster protocol?
options: Base is now the most popular client on protocol by messages sent.
Base has the lowest transaction fees of any client.
Base is the only client supporting content coins.
Base secured the largest amount of developer funding.
questions.explanation: Dan Romero stated: 'Base is now the most popular client on protocol by messages sent.'

questions.question: What capabilities did Jesse Pollak state he wanted to add to Neynar AI in his November 26 update?
options: Agent capabilities and building in-feed agents.
A customized knowledge base of Base documentation.
questions.explanation: Priority #2 was: 'Neynar AI: add agent capabilities, build in-feed agents on neynar'.

questions.question: In March 2024, the official Base account reported that revenue had done what in the previous week?
questions.explanation: The post reads: 'last week we doubled our revenue and I have no idea why'.

questions.question: After Coinbase closed its November 2023 fundraising, what was the first role they announced hiring for?
questions.explanation: The post states: 'the first role we're hiring for is a product designer'.

questions.question: Who did Jesse Pollak instruct users to DM to try out the mini app building tool in October 2025?
questions.explanation: JP posted: 'DM @calvino to try it out.'

questions.question: One of the three goals for the new Clanker launch feature, as detailed by Dan Romero, is 'Broad and fair ________.'
questions.explanation: Goal (a) was: 'Broad and fair distribution.'

questions.question: How much ETH did Brian Armstrong confirm sending to @robot for an OTC trade of @protardio?
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong confirmed: 'i sent the 100 eth to your wallet'.

questions.question: What Farcaster-related technical project did a Coinbase team member share in April 2023?
options: A new TypeScript SDK for frames
A guide to running a decentralized Hub
A smart contract for permissioned casting
questions.explanation: Coinbase shared a link to: 'an (incomplete) Python port of @farcaster/hub-nodejs.'

questions.question: In October, Jesse Pollak asked Neynar to introduce him to new followers using his top 9 casts. What restriction did he place on Neynar’s introduction?
options: Don't talk about stats like followers or other internal data.
The introduction must be less than 280 characters.
Only use information from the last 6 months of casts.
It must be written in the style of a haiku.
questions.explanation: JP instructed: 'don't talk about stats like followers or other internal data. focus on my projects, interests, and vibe.'

questions.question: Regarding the 'beep messages' feature, what percentage of the fee did Brian Armstrong state would go to the readers?
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong posted: '0% fee, 100% goes to readers'.

questions.question: The quoted source of money made on Farcaster, shared by Dan Romero, explicitly mentioned which five tokens/projects?
questions.explanation: The quote listed: 'Degen, Higher, Anon, Clanker, Aether.'

questions.question: What specific piece of personal information did Jesse Pollak ask Neynar for on December 4?
questions.explanation: JP asked: '@neynar what's my casting age?'

questions.question: Which specific geopolitical prediction market did Dan Romero mention having a 'coin flip' probability of war, referencing the movie 'Wag the Dog'?
questions.explanation: DR linked to Polymarket regarding the 'US x Venezuela Military Engagement'.

questions.question: Jesse Pollak recommended a mini app built using the Neynar app studio, highlighting which specific feature that @priyanka set up?
options: The admin view to see orders coming in
The ability to pay via ETH directly
questions.explanation: JP said: 'my favorite part was the admin view that @priyanka set up for herself to see the orders coming in.'

questions.question: What component did Brian Armstrong say his newly minted Petlet contained?
options: A bit of his Farcaster best friend's DNA
A tokenized piece of BASE L2 gas
questions.explanation: BA cast: 'It contains a bit of my Farcaster best friend's DNA'.

questions.question: One of the three goals for the new Clanker launch feature is 'Aligned economics between teams and ________.'
questions.explanation: Goal (c) was: 'Aligned economics between teams and holders.'

questions.question: According to the Anthropic report shared by Jesse Pollak, what was the total exploit revenue (in USD) achieved by AI agents in 2025, showing a significant leap from $5,000?
questions.explanation: The report cited a leap 'from $5,000 to $4.6 million in total exploit revenue.'

questions.question: What 'worst side effect' of the Coinbase hack did Jesse Pollak mention that related to privacy?
options: Inability to use different/pseudo phone numbers across services
Increased KYC requirements on all services
Loss of ability to use 'hide my email'
questions.explanation: JP mentioned the inability to use different/pseudo phone numbers like they can with 'hide my email' email addresses.

questions.question: What critical issue did Dan Romero identify regarding how existing Clanker presale proceeds interacted with token launch mechanics?
options: Presale proceeds do not contribute to the token’s liquidity at launch.
Presale proceeds are subject to mandatory tax.
Presale proceeds cannot be redeemed for fiat currency.
Presale proceeds are locked for a one-year vesting schedule.
questions.explanation: Issue #3 stated: 'Presale proceeds do not contribute to the token’s liquidity at launch.'

questions.question: What was Brian Armstrong doing in response to users reporting bugs faster than he could check?
options: Implementing a new bug bounty program
Ignoring them until the next release
questions.explanation: BA thanked users for reporting bugs faster than he could 'check sentry'.

questions.question: What user interaction statistic did Jesse Pollak ask Neynar to provide on October 15?
options: Who do you reply to the most?
Who follows me back the fastest?
Who has the highest Neynar score?
Who has minted the most NFTs?
questions.explanation: JP asked: '@neynar who do you reply to the most? give me the top 5 users'.

questions.question: How long did Dan Romero estimate the new Clanker launch feature, which replaces the existing presale mechanism, would take to build?
questions.explanation: DR stated: 'It will take a couple of months to build.'

questions.question: What protocol-wide statistic did Jesse Pollak query Neynar for on November 1?
options: How many likes across the entire farcaster protocol in the past 24 hours?
The total number of casts sent that day.
The median gas price on Base.
The most popular frame of the week.
questions.explanation: JP asked: '@neynar how many likes across the entire farcaster protocol in the past 24 hours?'

questions.question: Who did Brian Armstrong credit for officially whitelisting him, allowing him into a private community/feature?
questions.explanation: BA posted: 'Officially whitelisted by @jesus, Miracles do happen.'

questions.question: What was the next immediate step for the mini app studio mentioned by Jesse Pollak in October?
options: Replying to /someone-build casts with the mini apps
Opening the studio to the public without a DM
Developing a new UI for the admin dashboard
questions.explanation: JP said: 'next up - replying to /someone-build casts with the mini apps'.

questions.question: What specific automated feature was Dan Romero rolling out for Clanker?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero cast: 'Automated Clanker buys rolling out.'

questions.question: One of the three goals for the new Clanker launch feature is: 'Trading starts with deep liquidity at a market cap determined through ________.'
questions.explanation: Goal (b) specifies: '...market cap determined through price discovery.'

questions.question: What specific amount of ETH did Brian Armstrong transact with @robot for the OTC trade of @protardio?
questions.explanation: BA confirmed the amount: 'i sent the 100 eth to your wallet'.

questions.question: Why did the Coinbase team member Mircea Pasoi build the incomplete Python port of @farcaster/hub-nodejs?
options: To learn more about how Hubs work
To replace the existing Javascript hub implementation
questions.explanation: The post stated: 'I wanted to learn more about how Hubs work so I built an (incomplete) Python port...'

questions.question: While Dan Romero announced Base App content coins would display on Farcaster App, what corresponding functionality is NOT planned for Farcaster App?
options: Adding coining functionality from the Farcaster app
Allowing users to see content coin history
Displaying the content coin market cap
questions.explanation: DR stated: 'We don't have plans to add coining from the Farcaster app.'

questions.question: What specific team did Jesse Pollak ask about assembling in relation to the threat posed by autonomous AI agents?
options: The team of white hat agents
The team focused on hardware wallets
questions.explanation: JP finished his post with the question: 'Who is assembling the team of white hat agents?'

questions.question: What movie did Dan Romero link as relevant to the geopolitical prediction market regarding US-Venezuela military engagement?
questions.explanation: DR mentioned: 'Relevant movie here is "Wag the Dog"'.

questions.question: What specific term did Jesse Pollak use to describe the type of mini apps built using the app studio, emphasizing their cultural relevance?
questions.explanation: JP's Priority #3 was: 'App studio: vibe code mini apps'.

questions.question: Which limitation of the existing Clanker presale mechanism was related to unwinding a transaction?
options: The existing presale mechanism does not allow for cancellation or refunds.
questions.explanation: Issue #4 stated: 'The existing presale mechanism does not allow for cancellation or refunds.'

questions.question: What specific tab did Brian Armstrong recommend users check to understand the effort put into the @protardio project?
questions.explanation: BA advised: 'hope you guys all checked the lore tab'.

questions.question: What non-crypto event did a Bay Area landlord cite, according to a story shared by Jesse Pollak, as justification for raising rent?
options: The opening of a new L3 exchange
questions.explanation: The landlord reportedly said 'Anthropic's new office opened nearby.'

questions.question: What was the main outcome of the House team running the v4 presale functionality for Clanker?
options: The presale sold out immediately, before it could be announced in the app.
The presale failed to meet its liquidity goal.
The presale was successfully conducted without any issues.
The presale was cancelled due to a security flaw.
questions.explanation: Dan Romero stated: 'The presale sold out immediately -- before we had a chance to announce it in the app.'

questions.question: Regarding the Clanker ecosystem support updates, where were the ongoing native token fees redirected?
questions.explanation: Action #2: 'Redirected ongoing native token fees to creators'.
